artist: Artist: Alex Katz; Publisher: Peter Blum Edition, New York
creditline: Gift of David and Lisa Erickson
description: black pigment on cream paper; two thick black lines rise vertically at middle and right side as tree trunks; multidirectional black lines and abstract shaped black areas form branches and leaves; two horizontal black bands with uneven edges angle slightly up from LLC to right to form ground with cream stream or path (?) between them; pointed lines suggest grass at midground; paper has rough edges
image_copyright: © Alex Katz %2F Licensed by VAGA at Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C NY
provenance: John C. Erickson, New York; Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
title: Landscapes
